docs.text: georges polti once wrote a paper called " the thirty-six dramatic situations , " in which he asserted the fact that all drama could be defined by no more than thirty-six different situations .

docs.text: this may be the modern restatement of the biblical prophecy from ecclesiastes , " there's nothing new under the sun . "

docs.text: the faculty , the latest movie by from dusk till dawn director robert rodriguez , certainly proves this in typical hollywood fashion .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: there's not a measureable fraction of original material in this unworthy outing .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: drawing elements from both the puppet masters and invasion of the body snatchers , screenwriter kevin williamson ( of scream 2 credit ) gives us a horror tale set in middle america ( ohio ) one eventful fall .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: making use of a cast of unusually stock characters , williamson designs an alien invasion that will not be done independence day-style but rather " through the back door . "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: parasitic aliens take over the faculty of a run-down high school and soon have infested most of the student body , leaving it up to the ensemble of principal characters to win the day .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the lack of gusto is the movie's major stumbling block .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: even though the genre has seen movies that have a lack for quality such as this , they've been saved by an energetic approach .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: this casts more than a shadow of a doubt on williamson's ability , who enjoyed success with the wes craven-directed scream but couldn't pull anything solid in for this outing or i know what you did last summer .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: although he designs the faculty with more of a sci-fi bent than his typical slasher picture , it still comes down to the same results : throw the stock characters in a steel cage match and see who comes out alive .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: on that level , the main roles are played by virtual unknowns .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: only the recognizeable elijah wood ( deep impact ) is at the front ; other than that , the screen veterans are saved for the minor roles of the alien teachers .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: perhaps williamson has it in mind to champion these up-and-comers to the fame that their scream and last summer counterparts achieved ; but to do that , they'd all need to star in their own wb television show about the horrors of puberty a la " dawson's creek . "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: needless to say the acting is far from top notch , nor does necessity ask that it should be .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: there is a moment or two of genuine horror , but unfortunately williamson and rodriguez did not take the story far enough in the sci-fi direction to make any use of it .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in sum , the faculty was just one long shot that did not pay off .
